(ROOT
  (SBAR (IN If)
    (S
      (NP (PRP you))
      (VP (VBP are)
        (UCP
          (PP (IN in)
            (NP (DT the) (NNP Bukit) (NNP Timah) (NNP Food) (NNP Centre)))
          (CC and)
          (S
            (VP (VBG feeling)
              (ADJP (JJ guilty))
              (PP (IN about)
                (NP (PDT all) (DT the) (NN lardy)))
              (, ,))))))))


mark(are-3, If-1)
nsubj(are-3, you-2)
root(ROOT-0, are-3)
dep(are-3, in-4)
det(Centre-9, the-5)
nn(Centre-9, Bukit-6)
nn(Centre-9, Timah-7)
nn(Centre-9, Food-8)
pobj(in-4, Centre-9)
cc(in-4, and-10)
conj(in-4, feeling-11)
acomp(feeling-11, guilty-12)
prep(feeling-11, about-13)
predet(lardy-16, all-14)
det(lardy-16, the-15)
pobj(about-13, lardy-16)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NN artery) (NNS clogging))
    (VP (VBP stuff)
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (NP (PRP you))
          (VP (VBP have)
            (VP (VBN eaten)
              (NP (DT the) (NN night))
              (PP (IN before)))))))
    (, ,)))


nn(clogging-2, artery-1)
nsubj(stuff-3, clogging-2)
root(ROOT-0, stuff-3)
mark(eaten-7, that-4)
nsubj(eaten-7, you-5)
aux(eaten-7, have-6)
ccomp(stuff-3, eaten-7)
det(night-9, the-8)
tmod(eaten-7, night-9)
prep(eaten-7, before-10)


(ROOT
  (S (RB then)
    (VP (VB have)
      (NP (DT no) (NN fear)))
    (. !)))


advmod(have-2, then-1)
root(ROOT-0, have-2)
det(fear-4, no-3)
dobj(have-2, fear-4)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (EX There))
    (VP (VBZ 's)
      (NP
        (NP (DT a)
          (ADJP (RB pretty) (JJ decent))
          (NN fish) (NN soup) (NN stall))
        (PP (IN in)
          (NP (DT the) (NN food) (NN center))))
      (SBAR
        (WHADVP (WRB where))
        (S
          (NP (PRP you))
          (VP (MD can)
            (VP
              (VP (VB make)
                (NP (PRP$ your) (NN confession)))
              (CC and)
              (VP (VB receive)
                (NP (DT a) (NN pardon))))))))
    (. .)))


expl('s-2, There-1)
root(ROOT-0, 's-2)
det(stall-8, a-3)
advmod(decent-5, pretty-4)
amod(stall-8, decent-5)
nn(stall-8, fish-6)
nn(stall-8, soup-7)
nsubj('s-2, stall-8)
prep(stall-8, in-9)
det(center-12, the-10)
nn(center-12, food-11)
pobj(in-9, center-12)
advmod(make-16, where-13)
nsubj(make-16, you-14)
aux(make-16, can-15)
advcl('s-2, make-16)
poss(confession-18, your-17)
dobj(make-16, confession-18)
cc(make-16, and-19)
conj(make-16, receive-20)
det(pardon-22, a-21)
dobj(receive-20, pardon-22)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT The) (NN stall))
    (VP (VBZ makes)
      (S
        (NP (PRP it))
        (ADJP (RB very) (JJ clear)))
      (SBAR
        (SBAR (IN that)
          (S
            (NP (PRP they))
            (VP (VBP have)
              (VP (VBN been)
                (ADVP (RB around))
                (PP (IN since)
                  (NP (CD 1966)))))))
        (CC and)
        (SBAR
          (WHNP (WDT that))
          (S
            (VP (VBZ 's)
              (NP (DT a) (JJ good) (NN thing)))))))
    (. .)))


det(stall-2, The-1)
nsubj(makes-3, stall-2)
root(ROOT-0, makes-3)
nsubj(clear-6, it-4)
advmod(clear-6, very-5)
xcomp(makes-3, clear-6)
mark(been-10, that-7)
nsubj(been-10, they-8)
aux(been-10, have-9)
ccomp(makes-3, been-10)
advmod(been-10, around-11)
prep(been-10, since-12)
pobj(since-12, 1966-13)
cc(been-10, and-14)
nsubj(thing-19, that-15)
cop(thing-19, 's-16)
det(thing-19, a-17)
amod(thing-19, good-18)
conj(been-10, thing-19)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP They))
    (VP (VBP serve)
      (NP
        (NP (DT both) (NN Batang))
        (CC and)
        (NP (DT the)
          (ADJP (RBR more) (JJ expensive))
          (NNP Red) (NNP Grouper))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(serve-2, They-1)
root(ROOT-0, serve-2)
det(Batang-4, both-3)
dobj(serve-2, Batang-4)
cc(Batang-4, and-5)
det(Grouper-10, the-6)
advmod(expensive-8, more-7)
amod(Grouper-10, expensive-8)
nn(Grouper-10, Red-9)
conj(Batang-4, Grouper-10)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (PRP$ My) (NN wife))
      (SBAR
        (WHNP (WP who))
        (S
          (VP (VBZ is)
            (NP (DT the) (NN fish) (NN soup) (NN afficianado))))))
    (VP (VBD said)
      (SBAR
        (S
          (S
            (NP (DT the) (NN fish) (NN soup))
            (VP (VBD was)
              (ADJP (RB really) (JJ good))))
          (CC and)
          (S
            (NP (DT the) (NN fish))
            (VP (VBD was)
              (ADJP (JJ fresh)))))))
    (. .)))


poss(wife-2, My-1)
nsubj(said-9, wife-2)
nsubj(afficianado-8, who-3)
cop(afficianado-8, is-4)
det(afficianado-8, the-5)
nn(afficianado-8, fish-6)
nn(afficianado-8, soup-7)
rcmod(wife-2, afficianado-8)
root(ROOT-0, said-9)
det(soup-12, the-10)
nn(soup-12, fish-11)
nsubj(good-15, soup-12)
cop(good-15, was-13)
advmod(good-15, really-14)
dep(said-9, good-15)
cc(good-15, and-16)
det(fish-18, the-17)
nsubj(fresh-20, fish-18)
cop(fresh-20, was-19)
conj(good-15, fresh-20)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBD felt)
      (SBAR
        (S
          (NP (PRP it))
          (VP (VBD was)
            (UCP
              (NP
                (NP (DT a) (JJ decent) (NN bowl))
                (PP (IN of)
                  (NP (NN fish) (NN soup))))
              (CC and)
              (RRC
                (ADJP (JJR better))
                (ADVP (IN than) (JJS most))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(felt-2, I-1)
root(ROOT-0, felt-2)
nsubj(bowl-7, it-3)
cop(bowl-7, was-4)
det(bowl-7, a-5)
amod(bowl-7, decent-6)
ccomp(felt-2, bowl-7)
prep(bowl-7, of-8)
nn(soup-10, fish-9)
pobj(of-8, soup-10)
cc(bowl-7, and-11)
conj(bowl-7, better-12)
advmod(better-12, than-13)
dep(than-13, most-14)
